entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
